titleproper.value:
Guide to the Morris Paris Papers
                    <num>TAM.003</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment Staff

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2012-03-29T16:39-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: Morris Paris was a radio news commentator for WEVD, and assistant deputy controller of New York, N.Y. from 1938 to 1963. The papers contain typewritten manuscripts of "Review of the Week" (1943-1946), news commentary on WEVD, the Jewish Daily Forward Radio Station. Papers also include a series of articles titled, "Limited Dividend Housing becomes a Racket" (1934).

p.value:
Published citations should take the following form: 
                <lb/>

                <lb/>70 Washington Square South 
                <lb/>New York, NY 10012, New York University Libraries.
Morris Paris was a radio news commentator for WEVD, and assistant deputy controller of New York, N.Y. from 1938 to 1963.

The papers contain typewritten manuscripts of "Review of the Week" (1943-1946), news commentary on WEVD, the Jewish Daily Forward Radio Station. Papers also include a series of articles titled, "Limited Dividend Housing becomes a Racket" (1934).

subject.value: Housing policy |z New York (State) |z New York.
Radio broadcasting |z New York (State) |z New York.
